en.title: **Backend** Developer
en.text: Developed and maintained scalable backend systems for various clients, optimizing database performance and implementing RESTful APIs to improve application functionality.

es.title: Desarrollador **Backend**
es.text: Desarrollé y mantuve sistemas backend escalables para varios clientes, optimizando el rendimiento de la base de datos e implementando APIs RESTful para mejorar la funcionalidad de la aplicación.

fr.title: Développeur **Backend**
fr.text: Développé et maintenu des systèmes backend évolutifs pour divers clients, optimisant les performances de la base de données et implémentant des APIs RESTful pour améliorer la fonctionnalité de l'application.

ko.title: **백엔드** 개발자
ko.text: 여러 클라이언트를 위해 확장 가능한 백엔드 시스템을 개발하고 유지 관리하며, 데이터베이스 성능을 최적화하고 애플리케이션 기능을 개선하기 위해 RESTful API를 구현했습니다.

en.title: **Full-Stack** Engineer
en.text: Worked on enhancing the Coursera website by implementing new features and improving user experience, utilizing both frontend and backend technologies to ensure seamless functionality.

es.title: Ingeniero **Full-Stack**
es.text: Participé en la mejora del sitio web de Coursera al implementar nuevas funcionalidades y optimizar la experiencia del usuario, utilizando tecnologías de frontend y backend para asegurar un funcionamiento sin problemas.

fr.title: Ingénieur **Full-Stack**
fr.text: J'ai contribué à l'amélioration du site Web de Coursera en ajoutant de nouvelles fonctionnalités et en optimisant l'expérience utilisateur, en utilisant des technologies frontend et backend pour garantir un fonctionnement fluide.

ko.title: **풀스택** 엔지니어
ko.text: Coursera 웹사이트를 개선하기 위해 새로운 기능을 추가하고 사용자 경험을 최적화했습니다. 원활한 기능을 보장하기 위해 프론트엔드와 백엔드 기술을 모두 활용했습니다.

en.title: **Backend** Engineer
en.text: Contributed to the development of robust backend systems for Adobe Creative Cloud, integrating third-party services and improving data processing efficiency through cloud functions.

es.title: Ingeniero **Backend**
es.text: Contribuí al desarrollo de sistemas backend robustos para Adobe Creative Cloud, integrando servicios de terceros y mejorando la eficiencia en el procesamiento de datos mediante funciones en la nube.

fr.title: Développement et Maintenance **de Sites Web**
fr.text:
Au sein de l’entreprise, j’ai assuré la conception technique et graphique de sites web, leur développement complet ainsi que leur maintenance. Mon rôle consistait à créer des solutions web performantes, modernes et adaptées aux besoins des utilisateurs, tout en garantissant leur mise à jour régulière et leur bon fonctionnement:

  • Conception et modélisation de sites web selon les besoins et objectifs définis.
  • Développement de sites web dynamiques et responsives.
  • Maintenance corrective et évolutive des sites existants.
  • Optimisation des performances et de la sécurité des plateformes.

ko.title: **백엔드** 엔지니어
ko.text: Adobe Creative Cloud를 위한 강력한 백엔드 시스템 개발에 기여하였으며, 타사 서비스 통합과 클라우드 기능을 통해 데이터 처리 효율성을 향상시켰습니다.

en.title: IT & **Web and Internal Software Developer**
en.text:
In this versatile role, I play a key part in the development and maintenance of the company’s websites and internal applications, providing tailored solutions to meet team needs and optimize business processes. Alongside development tasks, I also manage the IT infrastructure and provide technical support for the network and systems:

  • Design, development, and maintenance of websites (showcase, intranet) and internal business tools.
  • Continuous improvement and updates of applications to meet specific department needs.
  • Participation in technical decisions and the evolution of web technologies used.
  • Management and maintenance of the IT asset inventory (installation, troubleshooting, user support).
  • Assistance with network administration (access management, security, backups).
  • Technology watch to ensure the performance, reliability, and security of developed solutions.

es.title: IT & **Web and Internal Software Developer**
es.text:
In this versatile role, I play a key part in the development and maintenance of the company’s websites and internal applications, providing tailored solutions to meet team needs and optimize business processes. Alongside development tasks, I also manage the IT infrastructure and provide technical support for the network and systems:

  • Design, development, and maintenance of websites (showcase, intranet) and internal business tools.
  • Continuous improvement and updates of applications to meet specific department needs.
  • Participation in technical decisions and the evolution of web technologies used.
  • Management and maintenance of the IT asset inventory (installation, troubleshooting, user support).
  • Assistance with network administration (access management, security, backups).
  • Technology watch to ensure the performance, reliability, and security of developed solutions.

fr.title: IT & Développeur ** Web et Logiciels Internes**
fr.text:
En occupant ce poste polyvalent, je joue un rôle clé dans le développement et la maintenance des sites web et des applications internes de l’entreprise, en veillant à proposer des solutions adaptées aux besoins des équipes et à l’optimisation des processus. En parallèle, je participe à la gestion du parc informatique et j’assure un soutien technique au niveau du réseau et des infrastructures:

  • Conception, développement et mise à jour de sites web (vitrine, intranet) et d’outils métiers internes.
  • Maintenance et amélioration continue des applications pour répondre aux besoins spécifiques des services.
  • Participation aux choix techniques et à l’évolution des technologies web utilisées.
  • Gestion et suivi du parc informatique (installation, maintenance, support utilisateur).
  • Assistance à l’administration réseau (gestion des accès, sécurité, sauvegardes).
  • Veille technologique pour garantir la performance et la sécurité des solutions développées.

ko.title: IT & **Web and Internal Software Developer**
ko.text:
In this versatile role, I play a key part in the development and maintenance of the company’s websites and internal applications, providing tailored solutions to meet team needs and optimize business processes. Alongside development tasks, I also manage the IT infrastructure and provide technical support for the network and systems:

  • Design, development, and maintenance of websites (showcase, intranet) and internal business tools.
  • Continuous improvement and updates of applications to meet specific department needs.
  • Participation in technical decisions and the evolution of web technologies used.
  • Management and maintenance of the IT asset inventory (installation, troubleshooting, user support).
  • Assistance with network administration (access management, security, backups).
  • Technology watch to ensure the performance, reliability, and security of developed solutions.
